com.spire.pdf
Class PdfDocumentTemplate

java.lang.Object
  com.spire.pdf.PdfDocumentTemplate
Direct Known Subclasses:
PdfSectionTemplate
public class PdfDocumentTemplate
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates a page template for all the pages in the document.
